alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 13 at 9:12PM PST until February 14 at 4:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Total snowfall of 1 to 4 inches at elevations above 4,000 feet. A dusting of snow is possible between 3,000 and 4,000 feet mainly late Tuesday morning and afternoon. Winds gusting as high as 80 mph in conjunction with snowfall will lead to very hazardous travel conditions. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains, Riverside County Mountains and San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
